The expert: s analysis of the timeline: The expert examined the official records and confirmed that General Joseph Dunford was appointed as Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff in 2015 and there was no record of his resignation or retirement.
Comparison of the claimed speech with of: The expert compared the text of the claimed resignation speech with official statements made by General Dunford. They found that the speech was not consistent with his previous statements or actions.
Lack of credible sources: The expert pointed out that the claim originated from a website called US Defense Watch, which is not a reputable or reliable source. The lack of credible sources supporting the claim raised doubts about its authenticity.
Confirmation from General Dunford: The expert mentioned that there was no statement or confirmation from General Dunford himself regarding his resignation or retirement. The absence of any official announcement further undermined the credibility of the claim.
